TopicTitle: Combined Outer Planets and New Horizons Delta V Subway Chart

Articles.Content:
Hi everybody,

Was wondering if there's an existing subway style chart for the combined Outer Planets and New Horizons Delta V out there? Would save a lot of probes and kerbals. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thanks in advance ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T11:48:38Z" title="07/13/2015 11:48  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by Vist**
